plot: A theatrical melodrama of metaphors examining identity and ego, set in a run down, 18th Century Betty Ford clinic where wealthy eccentrics who have lost control of their antisocial urges are exorcized of the evil of creative expression.
title: Manor of Redemption
plot_es: A theatrical melodrama of metaphors examining identity and ego, set in a run down, 18th Century Betty Ford clinic where wealthy eccentrics who have lost control of their antisocial urges are exorcized of the evil of creative expression.
plot_en: A theatrical melodrama of metaphors examining identity and ego, set in a run down, 18th Century Betty Ford clinic where wealthy eccentrics who have lost control of their antisocial urges are exorcized of the evil of creative expression.
